CodeAreaHelper - Class in codearea.control
Defines a richer set of editing and navigation methods for CodeArea, implemented as thin wrappers around CodeArea's basic methods, such as CodeArea.replaceText(int, int, String) or CodeArea.selectRange(int, int).
